entries.content: We could save your team cost on the vials, bottles, among other items. Would you be opposed to doing a cost comparison to see how much we might be able to save your team?
entries.notes: Framing the value proposition around cost savings and proposing a comparison.

entries.content: Our product is a very niche commodity product, so it's all based on savings, kind of like a Walmart model.
entries.notes: Understanding the core value proposition is cost reduction/savings for the customer.

focus_area: Handling Price Objections: Reframe to ROI, "Compared to what?", breakdown strategy
